text:
When I save the "Test Plan" it spits out the XML file with all the thread group 
information and such, but for some reasons, when I try to read it in nothings 
happens (no tab on the left side of "Test Plan" to indicate that the data's 
been read in). I wonder if it's something to do with OS X character encoding 
issue.
creator: ryos@ix.netcom.com

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
